Unique wondrous item
Shaped like a set of talons holding a sun sphere, the Clawed Scepter is made of gold and set with pearls and rubies in a rather garish, bold style. The holder of the scepter is immune to magical fear, cold, and fire, and gains the ability to make all Charisma (Persuade) ability checks with advantage.
